content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
Been here four times during my time in LA and THIS HITS THE SPOT!!! The fried chicken is made fresh and super crispy, the meat is so tender and super big actually. i get the soy garlic (the spicy version is actually super spicy) and the honey butter. it's soooooo yummy. super nice staff too. 10/10 recommend
